description: We are a passionate group of musicians dedicated to creating original music that resonates with audiences. Formed in 2020, we've been bringing our unique sound to local venues and festivals, building a community of fans who share our love for authentic, high-energy performances.
story: Our journey began when we met at a local open mic night. What started as impromptu jam sessions quickly evolved into something special. We blend elements of rock, indie, and alternative music to create a sound that's uniquely ours. Every show is an opportunity to connect with our audience and share the energy that drives us.
